Chapter Previous Next

class gstTransformMatrix

Homogeneous 3d tranformation matrix class. Order of operations is center, scale, rotation, then translation unless matrix is user defined. A matrix becomes user defined if one or more entries of the 4x4 array have been set explicitly. If a matrix is user defined then no assumptions are made about its form.

From header file: gstTransformMatrix.h
